content:
OperationRetrySettings Constructors

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Client
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.dll

In this Article

Overloads

OperationRetrySettings()

Instantiates OperationRetrySettings with default values for the retry settings. The default values for MaxRetryBackoffIntervalOnTransientErrors, NonTransientErrors are 2 seconds. The default value for MaxRetryCount is 10.
OperationRetrySettings(TimeSpan, TimeSpan, Int32)

Instantiates OperationRetrySettings with the supplied settings.

OperationRetrySettings()

Instantiates OperationRetrySettings with default values for the retry settings. The default values for MaxRetryBackoffIntervalOnTransientErrors, NonTransientErrors are 2 seconds. The default value for MaxRetryCount is 10.

public OperationRetrySettings ();

OperationRetrySettings(TimeSpan, TimeSpan, Int32)

Instantiates OperationRetrySettings with the supplied settings.

public OperationRetrySettings (TimeSpan maxRetryBackoffIntervalOnTransientErrors, TimeSpan maxRetryBackoffIntervalOnNonTransientErrors, int defaultMaxRetryCount);
Parameters
maxRetryBackoffIntervalOnTransientErrors
TimeSpan

Specifies the maximum interval to back-off before retrying incase of Transient errors

maxRetryBackoffIntervalOnNonTransientErrors
TimeSpan

Specifies the maximum interval to back-off before retrying incase of Non transient errors

defaultMaxRetryCount
Int32

Specifies the maximum number of times to retry.
